# Generated Design Output

This folder stores AI-generated visual assets and metadata.

## Structure
- `brand/logos/` - logo drafts and variants
- `brand/icons/` - icon drafts and symbols
- `marketing/images/` - generic marketing visuals
- `marketing/heroes/` - hero/header visuals
- `marketing/social/` - social media variants
- `_meta/prompts/` - exact prompts used
- `_meta/manifests/` - JSON metadata per generation

## Notes
- Keep generated files versioned (`*-v1`, `*-v2`).
- Keep manifest and prompt files together with each generated asset batch.
